sect3.title: Zend_Controller_Plugin_PutHandler
sect3.para: Zend_Controller_Plugin_PutHandler provides a drop-in plugin for marshalling PUT request bodies into request parameters, just like POST request bodies. It will inspect the request and, if PUT, will use parse_str to parse the raw PUT body into an array of params which is then set on the request. E.g.,
